synopsis.p: Classifies elements with a Weka classifier.

description.p: applies the classifier loaded from on elements specified by .

param-doc.name: predictedClassFeatureKey
param-doc.p: Feature where to write the class prediction.

param-doc.name: examples
param-doc.p: Elements to classify. This expression is evaluated as a list of elements with the corpus as the context element.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: evaluationFile
param-doc.p: File where to write evaluation results, if actual classes are available.

param-doc.name: classifierFile
param-doc.p: Serialized classifier file. This file must be generated by with the same .

param-doc.name: relationDefinition
param-doc.p: Specification of example attributes and class.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
